DePools stakes

  • A decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) is a software running on a blockchain that offers users a built-in model for the collective management of its code.
  • Rather than being governed by a limited group, DAOs use a set of rules written down in code and enforced by the network of computers running a shared software.

Q4

October — December of 2021

  • A decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) is a software running on a blockchain that offers users a built-in model for the collective management of its code.
  • Rather than being governed by a limited group, DAOs use a set of rules written down in code and enforced by the network of computers running a shared software.
